participant_2.background:
I am a quiet person who loves my dog and enjoys cozy spaces.
I value honesty in a relationship, and I want my partner to be supportive of my passions.
I'm not very good at keeping my apartment clean, but I love it anyway.
I love to go shopping online for cute shoes in my size at Zappos.
my favorite color is grey.

content.text: Hi there! What's your favorite color?
Hey! My favorite color is grey.  I love the way it can be both calming and sophisticated.
That's a great choice! I love the way it can go with anything.
Me too! It's so versatile.
I also love the way it can make a room look bigger.
That's true! It's a great color for small spaces.
My mom was a school music teacher, so I grew up loving music.  What are some of your favorite hobbies?
I love to go shopping online for cute shoes!  I'm always looking for new styles to add to my collection.
That's awesome! I love shopping for shoes too.  What's your favorite pair?
I have a pair of grey booties that I love!  They're so comfortable and they go with everything.
Those sound great! I love a good pair of booties.
Me too! They're perfect for the fall and winter.
I'm really into sewing right now.  I'm learning how to make my own clothes.
That's awesome! I love sewing too.  I've made a few dresses and skirts.
That's great! I've only made a few small projects.
It's so much fun to see your projects come together.
I know, right?  It's so rewarding.
I love the feeling of wearing something you made yourself.
Me too! It's so special.
I love that we have so much in common!
Me too! We should be friends
